thread.title: The Anatomy of a Phishing Attack - WSJ

author: Chris Kornelis
title: The Anatomy of a Phishing Attack - WSJ
text:
Cyberattacks on companies continue to grow more prevalent, sophisticated and dangerous. Organized criminals steal banking records, terrorists launch ransomware attacks, and state actors slip into information systems and go quiet until they see an opportunity to exploit their presence.
Earlier this year, the World Economic Forum reported that cyberbreaches recorded by businesses almost doubled in five years from 68 per business in 2012 to 130 per business in 2017.
